com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface VmResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/vm")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface VmResource
extends Serializable
    VM Resource Interface.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoreTask addVirtualDisk(String vmUuid, VirtualHardDisk disk)
      Updates the virtual disks for a VM.
      CoreTask copyVm(String vmUuid, String vappUuid, VmCopyMoveSpec spec)
      Creates a new Vm in the Vapp based on an existing Vm.
      CoreTask createSnapshot(String vmUuid, CreateSnapshotSpec spec)
      Create a snapshot for the given VM.
      CoreTask deleteMetadata(String vmUuid, String key)
      Delete a specific piece of metadata associated with a Vm by its key.
      CoreTask deleteVirtualDisk(String vmUuid, String diskName)
      Delete a virtual disk from a VM.
      CoreTask deleteVirtualNetworkCard(String vmUuid, String vnicId)
      Delete a vnic with the given ID for the given VM.
      CoreTask deleteVm(String vmUuid)
      Delete a VM.
      CoreTask ejectMedia(String vmUuid)
      Eject a media from a Vm.
      VmBootOptions getBootOptions(String vmUuid)
      Get the boot options for a given VM.
      List<VmAffinityRule> getDrsAffinityRules(String vmUuid)
      Get the DRS affinity and anti-affinity rules for the given vm.
      void getEventHistoryCsvEmail(String vmUuid, String email)
      Retrieve a CSV report email with all event history for a given Vm.
      GuestCustomizationSection getGuestCustomizationSection(String vmUuid)
      Get the guest customization section of a Vm.
      List<Metadata> getMetadata(String vmUuid)
      Retrieve metadata associated with a Vm.
      MksScreenTicket getMksScreenTicket(String vmUuid)
      Retrieve a mks screen ticket for viewing the console of a given Vm.
      List<Network> getNetworksFor(String vmUuid)
      Get the networks for a given VM.
      RecommendedDiskBusType getRecommendedDiskBusType(String vmUuid)
      Get the recommended hard disk bus type for the given VM.
      List<RestorePoint> getRestorePoints(String vmUuid)
      Get restore points for the given VM.
      ScreenTicket getScreenTicket(String vmUuid)
      Retrieve a screen ticket for viewing the console of a given Vm.
      Snapshot getSnapshot(String vmUuid)
      Get the snapshot for the given VM.
      List<VirtualHardDisk> getVirtualDisks(String vmUuid)
      Gets the virtual disks for a VM.
      List<VirtualNetworkCard> getVirtualNetworkCards(String vmUuid)
      Get a list of virtual network cards for the given VM.
      Vm getVm(String vmUuid)
      Get a Vm by UUID.
      Bill getVmBill(String vmUuid, Integer month, Integer year)
      Gets a bill for a specified VM.
      VmCapabilitySpec getVmCapabilities(String vmUuid)
      Get the VM capabilities for a VM.
      BillingSummary getVmCurrentBilling(String vmUuid)
      Return current vm billing for a give Vm.
      PerfSampleSerie getVmPerfFor(String vmUuid, String group, String name, String type, Long start, Long end, String interval, String limit)
      Get VM performance data for the given VM, counter, and time range.
      VmResourceSummary getVmSummary(String vmUuid)
      Get the resource summary for the given VM.
      GuestToolsInfo getVmToolsInfo(String vmUuid)
      Get VMWare tools information for the given VM.
      VmToolsUpgradePolicy getVmToolsUpgradePolicy(String vmUuid)
      Get the VMWare tools upgrade policy for the VM.
      CoreTask insertMedia(String vmUuid, VmInsertMediaSpec spec)
      Insert a media to a Vm.
      CoreTask installVMWareTools(String vmUuid)
      The actual action performed will be to mount the VMWare tools ISO on the given VM.
      CoreTask moveVm(String vmUuid, String vappUuid, VmCopyMoveSpec spec)
      Moves an existing VM into the specified Vapp.
      CoreTask powerOffVm(String vmUuid)
      Power off a VM.
      CoreTask powerOnVm(String vmUuid, boolean forceGuestCustomization)
      Power on a VM.
      CoreTask relocateVm(String vmUuid, VmRelocateSpec spec)
      Relocate a Vm to another storage profile.
      CoreTask removeSnapshot(String vmUuid)
      Remove a snapshot from a VM.
      CoreTask rename(String vmUuid, VmRenameSpec spec)
      Rename a VM.
      CoreTask resetMacAddresses(String vmUuid)
      Reset the MAC addresses for all VNICs of the VM.
      CoreTask resetVm(String vmUuid)
      Reset a VM.
      CoreTask restoreSnapshot(String vmUuid)
      Restore a VM from a snapshot.
      CoreTask restoreVm(String vmUuid, VmRestoreSpec spec)
      Restore a VM from a restore point into the same vApp.
      CoreTask restoreVmIntoVapp(String vmUuid, String vappUuid, VmRestoreSpec spec)
      Restore a VM from a restore point into the given vApp.
      CoreTask shutdownVm(String vmUuid)
      Shutdown a VM guest operating system.
      CoreTask suspendVm(String vmUuid)
      Suspend a VM.
      CoreTask updateBootOptions(String vmUuid, VmBootOptions bootOptions)
      Update boot options associated with a VM.
      CoreTask updateCpuCount(String vmUuid, VmUpdateCpuSpec spec)
      Update the cpu count for the given VM.
      CoreTask updateDescription(String vmUuid, VmUpdateDescriptionSpec spec)
      Update the description for a vm.
      CoreTask updateGuestCustomizationSection(String vmUuid, GuestCustomizationSection guestCustomizationSection)
      Update the guest customization section of a VM.
      CoreTask updateMemorySize(String vmUuid, VmUpdateMemorySpec spec)
      Update the memory size for the given VM.
      CoreTask updateMetadata(String vmUuid, List<Metadata> metadata)
      Add / update metadata associated with a Vm.
      CoreTask updateVirtualDisk(String vmUuid, VirtualHardDisk disk)
      Updates a virtual disk for a VM.
      CoreTask updateVirtualDisks(String vmUuid, List<VirtualHardDisk> disks)
      Updates the virtual disks for a VM.
      CoreTask updateVirtualHardwareVersion(String vmUuid)
      Upgrade the virtual hardware version of a vm to the latest available version.
      CoreTask updateVirtualNetworkCards(String vmUuid, List<VirtualNetworkCard> vnics)
      Update virtual network cards for a VM.
      CoreTask updateVmCapabilities(String vmUuid, VmCapabilitySpec spec)
      Update the VM capabilites for a VM.
      CoreTask updateVmToolsUpgradePolicy(String vmUuid, VmToolsUpgradePolicy upgradePolicy)
      Update the VMware tools upgrade policy.
      CoreTask upgradeVmTools(String vmUuid)
      Upgrade VMWare tools for the given VM.

      • getVmCurrentBilling

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vmUuid}/billing/current")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
BillingSummary getVmCurrentBilling(@PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                                               String vmUuid)
        Return current vm billing for a give Vm.
        Parameters:
        vmUuid - vm uuid
        Returns:
        current billing for VM

      • getVmBill

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vmUuid}/bill")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
Bill getVmBill(@PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                String vmUuid,
                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="month")
                                                                                                                Integer month,
                                                                                                                @QueryParam(value="year")
                                                                                                                Integer year)
        Gets a bill for a specified VM. Returns the current month bill by default, but query parameters can be used to select an earlier bill.
        Parameters:
        vmUuid - VM uuid
        Returns:
        bill for the specified VM

      • getVmPerfFor

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{vmUuid}/p")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
PerfSampleSerie getVmPerfFor(@PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                           String vmUuid,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="group")
                                                                                                                           String group,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                           String name,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                           String type,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="start")
                                                                                                                           Long start,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="end")
                                                                                                                           Long end,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="interval")
                                                                                                                           String interval,
                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                           String limit)
        Get VM performance data for the given VM, counter, and time range.
        Parameters:
        vmUuid - vm uuid
        group - perf counter group
        name - perf counter name
        type - perf counter type
        start - start date
        end - end date
        interval - interval
        limit - limit
        Returns:
        performance sample serie for the given VM, counter and time range

      • powerOnVm

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{vmUuid}/poweron")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask powerOnVm(@PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                        String vmUuid,
                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="forceGuestCustomization")
                                                                                                                        boolean forceGuestCustomization)
        Power on a VM.
        Parameters:
        vmUuid - vm uuid
        forceGuestCustomization - optional param to force guest re-customization on restart defaults to false
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details
